item.title: JC/About
item.description: About Me I am a PhD Candidate at SCSE, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore. My research is funded by ASTAR SINGA scholarship. My name is pronounced as Yakub Chernee. Research Interests Artificial intelligence, multi-agent systems, computational game theory, decision making, bounded rationality, robustness, optimization, cooperation. Education MSc (Hons) in Artificial Intelligence (minor in Robotics) at Czech Technical University. MSc in Discrete Models and Algorithms at Charles University. Publications My Erdős number is 4.

item.title: JC/Contact
